name: OVER THE ROCKS
description:
From “A Dream Among Another Dreams!” series
While these works were being shaped, I constantly sought to look at nature and a representation of its image. The image will be neither altogether real nor thoroughly fantastical, for it comes from my take on the nature as it is conceived in my mind through the impact of various media.

Oil on canvas - 2017
28*18 cm - 1624 X 2534 pixel
Exhibited in Mohsen gallery-Tehran-(Episode02:Midday)
